name: Mekaboo
description:
Mekaboo NFTs will be the heart of the Mekaboo universe. Each NFT will receive its fair share of the revenue generated from royalty fees and trading fees of the Mekaboo token, which will later be airdropped. Mekaboos will also serve as your pass to our unique games, where you can win additional rewards. Own a Mekaboo and gain access to a whole new universe on TON. 

 Join the Mekaboos!
